title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1160.8 - Scheduled shuttle service-concession
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1160.8 - Scheduled shuttle service-concession

State Regulations
(a) General system. A scheduled shuttle
service-concession has the right to load/unload and stage vehicles engaged in
providing scheduled shuttle service only, from areas designated by the airport
manager. The concessionaire may solicit airport passenger business by utilizing
a starter. (b) Fees and charges. As
set forth in the executed concession agreement between the NFTA and
concessionaire. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1160.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
